mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(sum(IFNULL( cwj.tax, 0 )), 0) FROM corporation_wallet_journals cwj WHERE cwj.corporation_id = #{corpId} AND cwj.ref_type = 'bounty_prizes' AND date( cwj.date ) >= STR_TO_DATE('2020-10-1', '%Y-%m-%d') AND date(cwj.date) < date_add(STR_TO_DATE('2020-10-1', '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 month)
